fields.name: Thunderclap (x2, Cost 100%/70%):
fields.value: 3 random Investigative abilities used tonight will be Astrally roleblocked. You are roleblock immune while using this ability. An Investigative ability is any ability that is used by a role with the Investigative subalignment OR that has a consequence that informs the user of a role, alignment, score, or visit.

fields.name: Shockwave (Cost 60%/40%):
fields.value: Target a player. Anyone who attempted to visit them will be roleblocked and penalized 10% score the next Evening.

fields.name: Mark of Lightning (Cost 30%/15%):
fields.value: Target a response and a player during the Evening, before results. If that player had submitted that response, you will place a Strike on them, informing all non-Town roles of that at the beginning of the next Night. Their Defense Score will be dropped to 0.0% for the Night.
